name.description: The name of the product (e.g., 'Coffee Beans').

description.description: A brief description of the product.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the product (e.g., 'kg', 'liters', 'units').

CentralStockItem.title: Central Stock Item
CentralStockItem.description: Represents a product's stock in the central warehouse.

quantity.description: The total quantity available in the central warehouse.

LocalStockItem.title: Local Stock Item
LocalStockItem.description: Represents a product's stock in a specific location's inventory.

quantity.description: The quantity available at the local inventory.

MenuItem.title: Menu Item
MenuItem.description: Represents a single item on the restaurant's menu.

name.description: The name of the menu item (e.g., 'Cheeseburger').

description.description: A brief description of the menu item.

price.description: The price of the menu item.

category.description: The category the menu item belongs to.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image for the menu item.

isAvailable.description: Whether the menu item is currently available.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a customer's order for a specific table.

tableNumber.description: The table number for the order.

items.description: The list of items included in the order.

status.description: The current status of the order.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the order was created.

OrderItem.title: Order Item
OrderItem.description: Represents a single item within an order.

/centralStock/{productId}.description: Stock levels in the central warehouse.

/locations/{locationId}/localStock/{prod.description: Stock levels for a specific location.

/menuItems/{menuItemId}.description: Stores all menu items for the restaurant.
